title: VLOOKUP
description: Performs a dynamic lookup on a specified Salesforce object and returns the value of a selected field from the first record that matches the provided conditions.

parameters.name: target_object_name
parameters.description: The API name of the object to query.

parameters.name: return_field_name
parameters.description: The API name of the field to return from the matching record(first record if there are multiple matches.).

parameters.name: …[matching_field_name, matching_field_value]
parameters.description: One or more field name–value pairs used to define equality filters (e.g., "Email", "[abc@example.com](mailto:abc@example.com)"). All specified pairs are combined using AND logic.

parameters.name: additional_clause_optional
parameters.description: Additional SOQL criteria for restricting or ordering the matching results.

examples:
VLOOKUP("Opportunity", 
        "StageName", 
        "AccountId", Id, 
        "IsClosed = true")
-- Retrieves the StageName from the first Opportunity record where:
-- AccountId matches the current record's Id
-- IsClosed equals true

VLOOKUP("Opportunity", 
        "Amount", 
        "AccountId", Id, 
        "OwnerId", OwnerId, 
        "Probability", 50)
-- Retrieves the Amount from the first Opportunity record where:
-- AccountId matches the current record's Id
-- OwnerId matches the current record's OwnerId
-- Probability equals 50
